slides.alt: The Corner House pub exterior at dusk with warm lighting and welcoming atmosphere.
slides.eyebrow: Cambridge corner pub for HD sport, cosy snugs & Nepalese kitchens.
slides.headline: Welcome to {{brand.shortName}}
slides.copy: An independent Newmarket Road pub where HD matchdays meet Nepali-chef curries, pub classics, and a heated garden packed with private cabins.

slides.alt: Long rustic table layered with Nepalese sharing plates, salads, pickles, and drinks ready for a crowd inside the pub.
slides.eyebrow: Gather the crew around a table full of colour.
slides.headline: Feasts Made for Sharing
slides.copy: Mix momo, samosa, onion bhaji, crispy squid, and crunchy salads for the ultimate {{brand.nickname}} feast — ideal for family-style dining or laid-back celebrations.

slides.alt: Warm wood bar with glass racks and a row of beer taps in a cosy pub interior.
slides.eyebrow: Cask ales, craft lagers & small-batch spirits.
slides.headline: Pouring Character
slides.copy: From perfectly kept pints to classic cocktails, our bar team knows their way around a pour. Pull up a stool and settle in.

slides.alt: Large pub garden with outdoor seating area and relaxed atmosphere.
slides.eyebrow: Big garden energy – gather, relax, and watch the sky turn indigo.
slides.headline: Evenings Under the Lights
slides.copy: From golden hour to starlight, our garden is your go-to for after-work drinks, weekend catch-ups, and easy outdoor dining.

slides.alt: Bowl of mixed green salad with cherry tomatoes and cucumber on a white plate.
slides.eyebrow: Crunchy greens, bright flavours, made to order.
slides.headline: Fresh Starts
slides.copy: A simple, satisfying bowl—crisp leaves, juicy tomatoes, cool cucumber and a zesty house dressing. Perfect on its own or alongside a pint.

slides.alt: Cosy dining area with warm lighting and comfortable seating.
slides.headline: Dine in Style
slides.copy: Whether it's a romantic dinner for two or a celebration with friends, our cosy dining areas provide the perfect backdrop.
